distributed representations.from sentence: In this work , we instead train a deep neural network to build distributed representations of pairs of coreference clusters .

large number.from sentence: This captures entity - level information with a large number of learned , continuous features instead of a small number of hand - crafted categorical ones .

has.from sentence: Using the cluster - pair representations , our network learns when combining two coreference clusters is desirable .

coreference clusters.from sentence: At test time it builds up coreference clusters incrementally , starting with each mention in its own cluster and then merging a pair of clusters each step .

strengths.of: cluster - ranking ( Rahman and and easy - first coreference algorithms

novel easy - first cluster - ranking pro.from sentence: It makes these decisions with a novel easy - first cluster - ranking procedure that combines the strengths of cluster - ranking ( Rahman and and easy - first coreference algorithms .

learning - to - search algorithm.from sentence: We address this by using a learning - to - search algorithm inspired by SEARN to train our neural network .

which action.from sentence: This approach allows the model to learn which action ( a cluster merge ) available from the current state ( a partially completed coreference clustering ) will eventually lead to a high - scoring coreference partition .
